message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_XFV_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT_EMPTY
message.locale: The deduction amount must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_XFV_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT_LESS
message.locale: The deduction amount must be greater than the organisation minimum deduction amount of %1n.
The deduction amount must be greater than the organization minimum deduction amount of %1n.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_XFV_DEDUCTION_RATE_GREATER
message.locale: The deduction rate entered cannot be greater than %1n, the maximum organisation deduction rate.
The deduction rate entered cannot be greater than %1n, the maximum organization deduction rate.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_PMT_STARTDATE_FAILURE
message.locale: A deduction cannot be created from a date which has already been paid in respect of this case. The deduction can only be created from a date after '%1d'.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_XFV_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT_GREATER
message.locale: The deduction amount cannot be greater than %1n, the maximum amount available for deduction off selected component.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_XFV_LIABILITY_BALANCE_ZERO
message.locale: No deductions can be created against the selected liability as it has an outstanding balance of zero.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_XFV_LIABILITY_BALANCE_SMALL
message.locale: The deduction amount specified is greater than the outstanding balance on the liability of %1n.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_MODIFICATION_STATUS_CANCELED
message.locale: The deduction details cannot be modified as the deduction has a status of canceled.
The deduction details cannot be modified as the deduction has a status of cancelled.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_STARTDATE_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The deduction cannot be modified as deductions have already been processed up to %1d. Consider ending the deduction, to prevent further deductions being processed.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_AMOUNT_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The deduction cannot be modified as deductions have already been processed up to %1d. Consider ending the deduction, to prevent further deductions being processed.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_MODIFICATION_ENDDATE_FAILURE
message.locale: The deduction end date cannot be modified to a date for which deductions have been made in respect of this deduction item. The earliest date that the end date can be set to is '%1d'.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_XFV_CLOSED_CASE
message.locale: A deduction cannot be made from a case with a status of closed.

message.name: ERR_DEDUCTIONITEMASSISTANT_STARTDATE_BEFORE_PAYMENT_TO_DATE
message.locale: The start date cannot be modified as payments have already been made on this date. The earliest date that the start date can be set to is '%1d'.
